sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ConnectWallet/>
</template>

<script>
import ConnectWallet from './components/ConnectWallet.vue'
import connect from './composables/index'
import {onMounted} from 'vue'
export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    ConnectWallet
  },
  setup: () => {
    onMounted(async () => {
      const {state} = connect();
      const {ethereum} = window;
      console.log(state.status);
      if (state.status) {
        ethereum.on('disconnect', (err) => {console.log(err); console.log("disconnected"); state.status = false; state.address = "" });
      }
    });
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
